title: Old Pal
author: Pam Greer
instructions: Add ice cubes to a mixing glass.
Add a large cube to a rocks glass.
Pour in the whiskey, vermouth and Campari.
Strain the cocktail over the ice in rocks glass.
Twist the orange peel over the drink to express the oils and then drop in the glass.
notes: This version of the Old Pal cocktail is a little whiskey forward.  You can use equal parts whiskey, vermouth, and Campari to make a more traditional version of the cocktail.
